DOC: article-3903.txt.xml story | 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 | The United States has offered a $ 10 million bounty for the founder of the Pakistani militant group blamed for the 2008 attacks in the Indian city of Mumbai that killed 166 people , a move that could complicate U.S.-Pakistan relations at a tense time , The Associated Press reported . the United States have offer a $ 10 million bounty for the founder of the pakistani militant group blame for the 2008 attack in the indian city of Mumbai that kill 166 people , a move that could complicate U.S.-Pakistan relation at a tense time , the Associated Press report .
